name: casablanca
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the central part of Morocco: I run an upscale little café and nightclub in Casablanca, Morocco. He was born in Casablanca to a French military family, and earned a degree from the University of Tunis.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Casablanca the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Casablanca.From a prison near Casablanca, they made it 200 miles north to Tangier and got word to French journalists.
